Report: MLB intends to suspend A-Rod, Ryan Braun

Major League Baseball intends to suspend about 20 players — including Alex Rodriguez of the Yankees and Ryan Braun of the Brewers — for their connection to a Miami-based clinic that deals in performance-enhancing substances, ESPN is reporting tonight.

Markey ad targets Gomez ahead of debate

Edward J. Markey released a 60-second radio advertisement that peppers listeners with questions about his opponent, Gabriel E. Gomez, and attempts to paint the Republican as an opaque figure.

Protester interrupts First Lady at fundraiser

Michelle Obama threatened to leave a nighttime fundraiser unless a protester quit interrupting her speech.

Cool cause: Scenes from this year's Scooper Bowl

(Matt Juul for Boston.com)
Ice cream fans young and old came out in droves to City Hall Plaza for the 31st annual Jimmy Fund Scooper Bowl, with proceeds going to Boston’s Dana-Farber Cancer Institute to benefit cancer research.
